game.name: Jumpers' mountain
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Join our little friends on this adventure, jumping between platforms to uncover the paths of 'Jumper's Mountain'. However, beware, as there are many secrets to reach the top, and a miscalculated jump can be quite costly.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Join our little friends on this adventure, jumping between platforms to uncover the paths of 'Jumper's Mountain'. However, beware, as there are many secrets to reach the top, and a miscalculated jump can be quite costly.
